listviewer 4.0.0

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

listviewer 4.0.0

  • update jsoneditor to completely rebuilt 0.18.7

listviewer 3.0.02019-11-02

API Changes - onEdit, onAdd, onDelete, and onSelect changed to allow disable. See pull 32. The default TRUE now will pass the event to Shiny if in Shiny context.

listviewer 2.1.02018-10-07

  • update jsoneditor to 5.24.6
  • update react-json-view to 2.5.7
  • add full set of props for react-json-view

listviewer 2.0.02018-03-26

  • change reactjson() to use react-json-view instead of react-json

listviewer 1.4.02016-11-03

  • add elementId to the jsonedit function
  • update react-json to 0.2.1
  • add helper number_unnamed function (see issue)

listviewer 1.3

  • add react-json as an alternate list viewer

listviewer 1.2

  • add RStudio addin capabilities

listviewer 1.1

  • add shiny gadget functionality with jsonedit_gadget

listviewer 1.02016-06-15

  • Submit to CRAN.
